property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Vortex: Choose 2 light creatures in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. Super Shield Plus: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top card of your deck face down under each of your shields. (Each card stack is still considered to be 1 shield.) Double Breaker

card.name: Lorenzo the 4th, Divine Dragon of Thunder

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent would choose one of your other creatures, they can't choose Knight creatures. (However, they may still be attacked or blocked.) All of your other Knight creatures get "Blocker". Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the end of your turn, if you have 2 or less cards in your hand, draw until you have 3 cards in your hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Vortex: Choose 2 darkness creatures in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. At the start of each of your turns, your opponent must choose a card in either their battle zone or mana zone and put it in their graveyard. Triple Breaker

card.name: Romanov the 1st, Lord of the Demonic Eye

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Choose 1 darkness card from it and put it into your graveyard. Then, shuffle your deck, When this creature attacks, you may choose 1 darkness spell with a cost of 6 or less from your graveyard and cast it without paying its cost. Then, put that spell on the bottom of your deck. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Vortex: Choose 2 fire creatures in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. Meteor Burn: When this creature attacks, you may put 1 card under this creature into the graveyard. If you do, destroy all of your opponent's creatures with "Blocker" that have a cost of 3 or less. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Samurai Generation (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand without paying its cost) Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Galaxy Vortex: Choose up to 3 nature creatures in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. This creature's power is equal to the total power of the creatures under it. If this creature has over 6000 power, it has "Double Breaker". If this creature has over 12000 power, it has "Triple Breaker". If this creature has over 18000 power, it has "Quad Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker If at least 1 card leaves your mana zone during a turn, this creature gets +7000 power and "Triple Breaker" until the end of that turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Evolution: Choose a light creature in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. When one of your creatures other than [Lion Third, Holy Emperor] attacks your opponent, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Force (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields. While the chosen shield remains in the shield zone, this creature gains the following [Sheild Force] abilities.) [Sheild Force] : This creature gains "Blocker". [Sheild Force] : When this creature would leave the battle zone, it stays in the battle zone instead. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. Choose 1 card from it and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may use the Knight Magic ability of your Knight spells an additional time.

card.name: Fernando the 7th, Emperor of Mystic Light

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have this creature cost 1 less for each spell in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 1. When this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. For each spell in your graveyard, the chosen creature gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature with 0 or less power is destroyed.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have cards with the same name in your mana zone or your graveyard, destroy this creature. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Evolution: Choose a fire creature in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. When this creatures attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, destroy 1 of your opponent's tapped creatures with 3000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear The crossed creature becomes an Armored Dragon and a Samurai in addition to its other races, gets +2000 power, and has the name [Bolmeteus Musha Dragon] in addition to its current name. When the crossed creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, choose one of your opponent's creatures with 6000 power or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Samurai Generation (When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand without paying its cost.) When this creature is destroyed, you may put 1 cross gear from your graveyard into the battle zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear When this card isn't crossed with a creature, your opponent's spells cost 1 more to cast. When the opponent would choose a creature for the effect of a spell, the creature this card is crossed with can't be chosen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shield Plus: When this creature attacks, you may put the top card of your deck face down under 1 of your shields. (Each card stack is still considered to be 1 shield.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be destroyed, instead of putting this creature into your graveyard you may choose 1 of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the shield trigger ability of that shield.

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a card leaves your mana zone, this creature gets +4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's tapped creatures. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Knight Magic] : Shield Plus: Put the top card of your deck face down under 1 of your shields. (Each card stack is still considered to be 1 shield.) Knight Magic (If there is a Knight in your battle zone, you may use this spell's [Knight Magic] ability once more.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all Knight cards revealed in this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules

Put all Samurai cards revealed in this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
